notes: Summary of estimated population movement in Haiti as of 24 October 2016. The estimated distribution of people for whom their home Section Communale in the pre-hurricane period was in either Grande Anse, Sud or Nippes départment, and as of 24 October had moved to another Section Communale. Estimates are based on movements of de-identified Digicel SIM cards which made or received at least one call pre-hurricane and on 24 October 2016. The SIM card movements are combined with available population data derived from estimates for the year 2015.
